name: E-Portfolio
description: A creative e-portfolio showcasing my projects and my experiences. Through the years of learning, I've demonstrated some of my best design programming skills in this project.

name: Authentication System
description: Advanced authentication using SHA256 encryption and JWT role based authentication, some of the most advanced security features. Users data are stored in HTTP-only cookies when logged in, managing login attempts, logging, and many more features. HTTPS is enabled!

name: ConUHacks8 - My A-Eye
description: A virtual Assistant for visually impaired people. Using Speech-To-Text and Text-To-Speech, the person can ask the AI to describe what is in front of him to visualize the surrounding through words.

name: McHacks10 - [3RD PLACE] NutroPNG
description: NutroPNG is a web app that helps people identify the food they are consuming to help them diet.

name: Wonda Cabinetry
description: A website showcasing the catalog and projects of the Wonda Cabinet Inc company. Using ThreeJS, users are able to view 3D products, and assemble them together to see if it is a right fit for their house.
